name: Panini Sticker Album
description:
Experience the thrill of the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022™ with the new Panini Digital Sticker Album in partnership with Coca-Cola! Download the app and enjoy the excitement on the go!

The online collection includes all 32 teams of the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022™, as well as additional content and special rewards to be completed during the event.

Start collecting TODAY and don’t forget to complete your collection before 31st January 2023! To complete your album even faster, play with your friends by creating a group of collectors or joining in on an existing group.

ENJOY ALL THE FUNCTIONS OF THE DESKTOP VERSION DIRECTLY ON YOUR SMART DEVICE

The mobile app offers you all the functions of the Panini Digital Sticker Album web site (https://www.fifa.com/paninistickeralbum) conveniently on your smart device
- manage your online album,
- collect more sticker packets,
- glue in your stickers,
- swap your stickers with other collectors
- create your group of collectors with your friends
- compete in unique challenges
- earn badges and complete the album

LOOK FOR CODES TO EARN MORE STICKERS

Whether it’s at the back of your physical Panini FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022™ stickers or on social media, find the codes to redeem more sticker packs. Complete your album as fast as you can for a chance to win great prizes!

UNLOCK EXTRA STICKER PACKETS WITH COCA-COLA PRODUCTS

Look for Coca-Cola products in participating countries and scan them to earn additional sticker packets and great player content! Look for Coca-Cola Team Belivers stickers in participating countries and scan them to unlock digital stickers and player stories.

*Coca-Cola Team Believers stickers available in Argentenia, Austria, Brazil, Columbia, Mexico and Serbia only on select bottles.
